entry.def: An intimation is an indirect suggestion or sign that something is likely to happen or be true.

example.ex: I did not have any intimation that he was going to resign.
example.tran: 我一点儿都不知道他要辞职。

sentences.sentence: "not a breath of scandal ever touched her"

means.word_mean: 2. a slight suggestion or vague understanding;

sentences.sentence: "he had no inkling what was about to happen"
